actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to make a grant to Monroe, Mo., for the construction of a facility system to interconnect with a rural electric cooperative.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to make a grant of $100,000 to Monroe, Missouri, for the construction of a facility system to interconnect with a rural electric cooperative.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to make a grant to Monroe, Mo., for the construction of a facility system to interconnect with a rural electric cooperative.
